alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 06 at 2:54PM CST until January 07 at 9:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...FIRST WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SECOND WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected tonight into Friday morning. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
